overview: When his sisterâ€™s murder unmasks a hidden drug ring, one man battles through a gaunlet of Kung-Fu experts in a thirst for revenge. The action spirals to an electrifying conclusion of sheer suspense, where no mercy will be granted to any who stand in his way.  Includes epic, original and fresh martial art fight sequences that will keep you on the edge of your seat. An all out tour de-force of martial art mastery.
title: Blood and Steel
